We ordered the small Beef Combo which was more than enough for 2 people. Meat is of good quality.Service - servers were friendly and attentive, and they Â grill the meat for you; reservations accepted; wait time to be seated not too long.Ambiance - nice Vibe; clean; good lighting and not too loud.Would definitely come back the next time I visit LA.
